source.absolute_timeline_notes: Night of the Calum-Tam raid/firefight; escape attempt reaches the perimeter gate amid incoming ravager assault.

text_windows.full_scene_clean: Demmy points out the small gate in the wall ahead as Quincy and Demmy haul the badly injured Chase toward it. Lenya intercepts them with four guards, pistol drawn, while distant heavy machine guns and explosions signal a ravager attack on the holdfast. Carl arrives with a club to finish them. Demmy admits he cannot shoot well left-handed. Chase asks for the 10mm pistol, takes it, and—despite barely standing—shoots Lenya in the chest after she taunts him. Carl charges Chase. Lesha appears, denounces Lenya, and decides to walk away from the burning holdfast; as Carl closes to strike, Lesha dives into his thigh and upends him. Demmy slides in and drives his stiletto into Carl’s neck, killing him. With the holdfast burning and guards wavering, Demmy urges immediate escape. Quincy confronts the fallen Lenya to find Lesha’s stims; after pleading from Chase, Lenya points to a hut beside the warehouse (top shelf vials) and, as a condition, rasps that if they see Jessop, they should “kill him dirty.” Quincy retrieves the vials. Demmy and Lesha shoulder Chase and the group flees through the gate as the holdfast burns.
text_windows.dense_recap_250w: At the Calum-Tam perimeter, Demmy guides Quincy and the barely mobile Chase toward a small gate when Lenya blocks them with four guards. Distant heavy weapons and fireballs mark a ravager assault engulfing the holdfast. Carl advances to crush the escapees. Demmy, poor with his left hand, hesitates to shoot. Chase, swaying, takes the 10mm and shoots Lenya in the chest after her taunt. Carl charges; Lesha, an ex-merc struggling with stim dependency, emerges from the shadows and declares she is leaving before the heavy weapons reach them. As Carl closes, Lesha tackles him low, flipping him; Demmy slides in and kills Carl with a stiletto to the neck. Lenya’s guards stand stunned; Lesha orders them to help their burning holdfast. Demmy urges flight, warning ravagers will be on them any moment. Quincy demands the location of Lesha’s stims; after Chase’s plea, a dying Lenya points to a hut beside the warehouse (top shelf vials) and adds a condition: if they see Jessop, kill him “dirty.” Quincy fetches the vials. Demmy and Lesha shoulder Chase, reholster weapons, and, half-carrying him, the group exits through the gate, leaving Calum-Tam to burn.
text_windows.query_handle: Gate standoff: Chase shoots Lenya; Lesha trips Carl; Demmy kills Carl; Quincy grabs Lesha’s stims; team escapes burning Calum-Tam.

narrative_beats.label: Intercept at the gate
narrative_beats.what_happens: Lenya and four guards block the escape near the perimeter gate as ravager gunfire rises.
narrative_beats.stakes_or_conflict: Immediate capture or death versus escape.

narrative_beats.label: Chase’s shot
narrative_beats.what_happens: After Lenya taunts him, Chase takes Demmy’s 10mm and shoots Lenya in the chest.
narrative_beats.stakes_or_conflict: Neutralize the commander to break the standoff.

narrative_beats.label: Carl charges; counter by Lesha and Demmy
narrative_beats.what_happens: Carl rushes to kill Chase; Lesha tackles him low and Demmy finishes Carl with a stiletto strike to the neck.
narrative_beats.stakes_or_conflict: Protect the wounded ally from a lethal blow.

narrative_beats.label: The price of information
narrative_beats.what_happens: Quincy presses dying Lenya for Lesha’s stims; Lenya reveals the stash location and demands Jessop be killed “dirty.”
narrative_beats.stakes_or_conflict: Acquire medicine to keep Lesha alive during withdrawal.

narrative_beats.label: Exfil through the gate
narrative_beats.what_happens: Quincy retrieves the vials; Demmy and Lesha help carry Chase as they flee the burning holdfast.
narrative_beats.stakes_or_conflict: Escape before ravagers overrun the area.

characters.goals_now: Get Chase out and secure stims for Lesha to survive withdrawal.
characters.obstacles: Armed intercept, chaos of battle, Chase’s injuries, time pressure.
characters.tactics: Coordinate with Demmy, brace/anchor Chase, confront Lenya, sprint to retrieve vials.

relationships.evidence: Signals Demmy to hand pistol to Chase; moves on his exfil plan.
Insults and refusal to surrender: “we're leaving this shitstain of a holdfast.”
Fetches Lesha’s stims to keep her alive.

characters.goals_now: Shepherd the team through the gate before ravagers arrive.
characters.obstacles: Left-handed pistol weakness, enemy intercept, battlefield chaos.
characters.tactics: Delegates the shot to Chase, uses stiletto for close kill, urges immediate exfil.

relationships.evidence: Shares assessment and tempo; both move on gate plan.
Hands over pistol; later shoulders his weight.

quotable_lines: Ravagers are going to be swarming this place at any moment.

characters.goals_now: Survive and protect his team despite injuries.
characters.obstacles: Broken arm and ribs, weakness, shock.
characters.tactics: Accepts pistol, fires decisive shot on Lenya; leans on allies for movement.

emotional_arc.end: barely conscious but alive and moving

characters.goals_now: Prevent escape; assert control of holdfast.
characters.obstacles: Ravager attack, wavering guards, outgunned at close range.
characters.tactics: Intimidation, calling reinforcements; final bargaining while dying.

relationships.evidence: Offers him a free shot; later names condition to kill Jessop.

quotable_lines: Only one condition... you see Jessop, kill him dirty.

characters.goals_now: Get out alive and obtain stims to avoid deadly withdrawal.
characters.obstacles: Stim dependency, collapsing security situation, Lenya’s control of supply.
characters.tactics: Assert independence, neutralize threat with a low tackle, accept help to exfil.
notable_actions: decides to walk out amid firefight

characters.goals_now: Kill or recapture the escapees, especially Chase.
characters.obstacles: Interception by Lesha and Demmy, chaos of attack.
characters.tactics: Direct charge with heavy club to deliver a killing blow.

relationships.evidence: Asks to ‘fix this’; charges on command.

items_and_tech.name: Carl’s heavy club

Is vengeance (‘kill him dirty’) ever a just condition for aid?

Demmy’s earlier neutralization of guards and gate plan

metadata_for_indexing.keywords_dense: Calum-Tam Holdfast, gate standoff, Lenya, Carl, Lesha, Quincy, Demmy, Chase, 10mm pistol, stiletto kill, ravager attack, warehouse hut, stim vials, explosions, heavy machine guns

qa_pairs.q: Who shoots Lenya at the gate?
qa_pairs.a: Chase shoots her in the chest with Demmy’s 10mm pistol.
Lesha tackles him low and Demmy stabs his neck with a stiletto.
In a small hut beside the warehouse, top shelf, as Lenya indicates.

qa_pairs.q: What condition does Lenya demand when revealing the stims?
qa_pairs.a: If they see Jessop, they should ‘kill him dirty.’

embedding_payloads.text: Near the small gate of the burning Calum-Tam Holdfast, Lenya and four guards block Demmy, Quincy, and the injured Chase. Amid heavy weapons fire, Chase takes Demmy’s 10mm and shoots Lenya. Carl charges but is upended by Lesha; Demmy kills Carl with a stiletto. Quincy pressures a dying Lenya to reveal where Lesha’s stims are stored (hut by the warehouse, top shelf). With vials in hand, Demmy and Lesha support Chase and the group escapes through the gate as the holdfast burns.

Actors: Quincy (support, retrieval), Demmy (lead exfil, knife kill), Chase (injured shooter), Lenya (holdfast commander), Carl (enforcer), Lesha (ex-merc, stim dependent), four guards (hesitant). Objects: 10mm pistol, stiletto, combat knife, stim vials. Locations: perimeter gate, warehouse flank, hut. Forces: ravagers attacking with heavy machine guns and explosives.

High-intensity, gritty third-limited action with terse, profane dialogue and visceral detail. Themes of loyalty under fire, pragmatic mercy, and collapsing authority. Motifs of gates/walls (barriers), fire/smoke (reckoning), and knives vs. clubs (skill vs. brute force). Moral tension peaks as aid is traded for a demand to ‘kill him dirty.’
